channel.title: Comments on: R.E.M. to release first official concert CD/DVD set

item.title: By: R.M.F.
item.dc:creator: R.M.F.
item.description:
25th anniversary of Chronic Town and yet its never had a proper stand alone release.
hell they should have done something special. repressed vinyl, new edition of the EP with some form of bonus material, something.
item.content:encoded:
25th anniversary of Chronic Town and yet its never had a proper stand alone release.

hell they should have done something special. repressed vinyl, new edition of the EP with some form of bonus material, something.

item.title: By: Kevin Langston
item.dc:creator: Kevin Langston
item.description: To be fair, I think the music for this film is supposed to service a bunch of audio recordings of Kurt talking about this, that and the other. It's not supposed to command the scene, only supplement it. So an instrumental might not be that inappropriate. Lest you forget, Cobain and Stipe were pretty tight, and there were rumors of a planned collaboration before he "got the lead out."
item.content:encoded: To be fair, I think the music for this film is supposed to service a bunch of audio recordings of Kurt talking about this, that and the other. It’s not supposed to command the scene, only supplement it. So an instrumental might not be that inappropriate. Lest you forget, Cobain and Stipe were pretty tight, and there were rumors of a planned collaboration before he “got the lead out.”

item.title: By: Logan Young
item.dc:creator: Logan Young
item.description: What the eff could the New Orleans instrumental say about Cobain?
item.content:encoded: What the eff could the New Orleans instrumental say about Cobain?
